alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and northern Oneida Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 647 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area to 8 miles west of Eagle River to 6 miles northwest of Newbold. Movement was east at 40 mph. Wind gusts between 30 and 35 mph have been reported at times with these storms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Eagle River around 655 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Phelps and Kentuck Lake Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
